main_definition: When a written work, such as an article or book, is made available to the public by having it printed and distributed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To officially make something available for the general public through printing
meanings_and_examples.example: The author's new novel was published last month.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having an article or book appear in print, such as a magazine, newspaper, or journal
meanings_and_examples.example: Her research findings were published in the Journal of Science.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To issue something for public distribution or circulation
meanings_and_examples.example: The company decided to publish its latest report online.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make a recording available on audio format, such as an album or podcast
meanings_and_examples.example: His music was published and released through various streaming platforms.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of making something known publicly or officially
meanings_and_examples.example: The government has not yet announced the official publication date for the new policy changes.
